bls.author: Bureau of Labor Statistics
bls.title: Business Dynamics Statistics (BDS) Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

minority_owned_entry_rate.long_description: Percent of minority_owned-owned businesses that are new: \[entry_rate=\frac{new_businesses}{all_businesses}\] A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

non_minority_owned_entry_rate.long_description: Percent of non_minority_owned-owned businesses that are new: \[entry_rate=\frac{new_businesses}{all_businesses}\] A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

minority_owned_exit_rate.long_description: Percent of minority_owned-owned businesses that have left: \[exit_rate=\frac{exited_businesses}{all_businesses}\] A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

non_minority_owned_exit_rate.long_description: Percent of non_minority_owned-owned businesses that have left: \[exit_rate=\frac{exited_businesses}{all_businesses}\] A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

minority_owned_number_businesses.long_description: Count of all minority_owned-owned businesses. A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

non_minority_owned_number_businesses.long_description: Count of all non_minority_owned-owned businesses. A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

minority_owned_new_businesses.long_description: Count of new minority_owned-owned businesses. A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

non_minority_owned_new_businesses.long_description: Count of new non_minority_owned-owned businesses. A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

minority_owned_exit_businesses.long_description: Count of new minority_owned-owned businesses. A minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.

non_minority_owned_exit_businesses.long_description: Count of new non_minority_owned-owned businesses. A non-minority-owned business is a U.S. business that is at least 51% owned by, and whose management and daily business operations are controlled by, one or more members not of a socially and economically disadvantaged minority group, namely U.S. citizens who are African Americans (Black), Hispanic Americans, Native Americans, Asian-Pacific Americans and Sub-Continent Asian Americans. Available for US businesses.
